questions.q: What does 'Más vale tarde que nunca' mean?
What does 'Estar en las nubes' mean?
What does 'Ser pan comido' mean?
questions.a: To be a piece of cake

questions.q: What does 'Tirar la toalla' mean?
What does 'Vale la pena' mean?
What does 'En boca cerrada no entran moscas' mean?
What does 'Estar como una cabra' mean?
What does 'No tener pelos en la lengua' mean?
What does 'Ser uña y carne' mean?
What does 'Ojos que no ven, corazón que no siente' mean?
questions.a: Out of sight, out of mind

questions.q: What does 'Estar hecho polvo' mean?
What does 'Ser la oveja negra' mean?
What does 'Dar en el clavo' mean?
questions.a: To hit the nail on the head

questions.q: What does 'Estar sin blanca' mean?
What does 'Hacerse la vista gorda' mean?
What does 'Matar dos pájaros de un tiro' mean?
questions.a: To kill two birds with one stone

questions.q: What does 'Estar entre la espada y la pared' mean?
questions.a: To be between a rock and a hard place

questions.q: What does 'Ser todo oídos' mean?
What does 'Tener la sartén por el mango' mean?
What does 'Estar en apuros' mean?
What does 'Petit à petit, l’oiseau fait son nid' mean?
questions.a: Little by little, the bird builds its nest

questions.q: What does 'Mieux vaut prévenir que guérir' mean?
What does 'Qui vivra verra' mean?
What does 'L’habit ne fait pas le moine' mean?
questions.a: Don’t judge a book by its cover

questions.q: What does 'Tout ce qui brille n’est pas or' mean?
questions.a: All that glitters is not gold

questions.q: What does 'L’appétit vient en mangeant' mean?
What does 'Après la pluie, le beau temps' mean?
What does 'Il ne faut pas vendre la peau de l’ours avant de l’avoir tué' mean?
questions.a: Don’t count your chickens before they hatch

questions.q: What does 'Loin des yeux, loin du cœur' mean?
questions.a: Out of sight, out of mind

questions.q: What does 'Mieux vaut tard que jamais' mean?
What does 'Qui se ressemble s’assemble' mean?
questions.a: Birds of a feather flock together

questions.q: What does 'Chacun voit midi à sa porte' mean?
questions.a: Everyone sees noon at their own door (people see things their own way)

questions.q: What does 'Il n’y a pas de fumée sans feu' mean?
What does 'Pierre qui roule n’amasse pas mousse' mean?
questions.a: A rolling stone gathers no moss

questions.q: What does 'Un tiens vaut mieux que deux tu l’auras' mean?
questions.a: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

questions.q: What does 'Tant va la cruche à l’eau qu’à la fin elle se casse' mean?
questions.a: If you keep doing something risky, it will eventually go wrong

questions.q: What does 'Aide-toi, le ciel t’aidera' mean?
questions.a: God helps those who help themselves

questions.q: What does 'Les murs ont des oreilles' mean?
What does 'On ne fait pas d’omelette sans casser des œufs' mean?
questions.a: You can’t make an omelette without breaking eggs

questions.q: What does 'Qui court deux lièvres à la fois n’en prend aucun' mean?
questions.a: Chasing two rabbits at once, you catch none

questions.a: Please take care of me / Nice to meet you

What does 'いってらっしゃい (Itterasshai)' mean?
What does 'ただいま (Tadaima)' mean?

What does '何 (Nani)' mean?
What does 'どこ (Doko)' mean?
What does 'いつ (Itsu)' mean?
What does '誰 (Dare)' mean?
What does 'Chi dorme non piglia pesci' mean?
What does 'Meglio soli che male accompagnati' mean?
questions.a: Better alone than in bad company

questions.q: What does 'L’abito non fa il monaco' mean?
What does 'Chi va piano va sano e va lontano' mean?
questions.a: Slow and steady wins the race

questions.q: What does 'Tutte le strade portano a Roma' mean?
What does 'Non è tutto oro quel che luccica' mean?
questions.a: All that glitters is not gold

questions.q: What does 'Tra il dire e il fare c’è di mezzo il mare' mean?
What does 'Paese che vai, usanza che trovi' mean?
questions.a: When in Rome, do as the Romans do

questions.q: What does 'Chi trova un amico trova un tesoro' mean?
questions.a: A friend in need is a friend indeed

questions.q: What does 'Ride bene chi ride ultimo' mean?
questions.a: He who laughs last, laughs best

questions.q: What does 'Occhio per occhio, dente per dente' mean?
questions.a: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth

questions.q: What does 'La speranza è l’ultima a morire' mean?
questions.a: Hope is the last to die

questions.q: What does 'Non si può avere la botte piena e la moglie ubriaca' mean?
questions.a: You can’t have your cake and eat it too

questions.q: What does 'Chi semina vento raccoglie tempesta' mean?
What does 'Gallina vecchia fa buon brodo' mean?
questions.a: Old hens make good broth (age brings wisdom)

questions.q: What does 'Acqua passata non macina più' mean?
What does 'Non tutte le ciambelle riescono col buco' mean?
What does 'Chi troppo vuole nulla stringe' mean?
What does 'La calma è la virtù dei forti' mean?
questions.a: Calmness is the virtue of the strong

questions.q: What does 'Ogni morte di papa' mean?
